020
021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
023import net.tnemc.core.account.PlayerAccount;
024import net.tnemc.core.manager.TransactionManager;
025import net.tnemc.core.transaction.Receipt;
026import net.tnemc.core.transaction.history.AwayHistory;
027import net.tnemc.core.transaction.history.SortedHistory;
028
029import java.util.Date;
030import java.util.List;
031import java.util.Map;
032import java.util.Optional;
033import java.util.Queue;
034import java.util.TreeMap;
035import java.util.UUID;
036import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue;
037
038/**
039 * ReceiptBox represents an object that can hold receipts.
040 *
041 * @author creatorfromhell
042 * @see Receipt
043 * @since 0.1.2.0
044 */
045public class ReceiptBox {
046
047  private final Queue<UUID> receipts = new ConcurrentLinkedQueue<>();
048
049  private AwayHistory away = null;
050  private SortedHistory sorted = null;
051  private boolean checked = false;
052
053  private final UUID owner;
054
055  public ReceiptBox(final UUID owner) {
056
057    this.owner = owner;
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Used to calculate transactions that happened while an account owner was away.
062   *
063   * @param account The identifier of the account.
064   *
065   * @return An Optional containing the account history if applicable, otherwise an empty Optional.
066   */
067  public Optional<AwayHistory> away(final UUID account) {
068
069    if(checked) {
070      return Optional.ofNullable(away);
071    }
072    checked = true;
073
074    if(away != null) {
075      return Optional.of(away);
076    }
077
078    final Optional<Account> acc = TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(account);
079    if(acc.isEmpty() || !(acc.get() instanceof PlayerAccount)) {
080      return Optional.empty();
081    }
082
083    final AwayHistory history = new AwayHistory(account);
084    final long time = new Date().getTime();
085
086    int i = 0;
087
088    for(final Map.Entry<Long, Receipt> entry : range(((PlayerAccount)acc.get()).getLastOnline(), time).entrySet()) {
089
090      final Receipt receipt = entry.getValue();
091
092      if(receipt.getFrom() != null && receipt.getFrom().getId().equals(account)
093         || receipt.getTo() != null && receipt.getTo().getId().equals(account)) {
094        history.getReceipts().put(receipt.getTime(), receipt.getId());
095        i++;
096      }
097    }
098
099    if(i <= 0) {
100      return Optional.empty();
101    }
102
103    away = history;
104    return Optional.of(history);
105  }
106
107  public SortedHistory getSorted(final UUID identifier) {
108
109    if(sorted == null) {
110      sorted = new SortedHistory(identifier);
111    }
112    return sorted;
113  }
114
115  /**
116   * Used to clear the AwayHistory instance.
117   */
118  public void clearAwayReceipts() {
119
120    away = null;
121    checked = false;
122  }
123
124  /**
125   * Logs a receipt reference to this receipt box.
126   *
127   * @param receipt The {@link Receipt} to log.
128   */
129  public void logReference(final Receipt receipt) {
130
131    receipts.add(receipt.getId());
132  }
133
134  /**
135   * Used to destroy a receipt based on the time it occurred.
136   *
137   * @param time The time to use for the destruction.
138   */
139  public void destroy(final long time) {
140
141    TransactionManager.receipts().removeReceiptsByTimeAndParticipant(time, owner);
142  }
143
144  /**
145   * Used to destroy a receipt based on the {@link UUID} it occurred.
146   *
147   * @param identifier The identifier to use for the destruction.
148   */
149  public void destroy(final UUID identifier) {
150
151    receipts.remove(identifier);
152  }
153
154  /**
155   * Used to find a receipt based on the time it occurred.
156   *
157   * @param time The time to use for the search.
158   *
159   * @return An optional with the {@link Receipt} if it exists, otherwise an empty Optional.
160   */
161  public List<Receipt> findReceipts(final long time) {
162
163    return TransactionManager.receipts().getReceiptByTime(time);
164  }
165
166  /**
167   * Used to find a receipt based on the {@link UUID} it occurred.
168   *
169   * @param identifier The {@link UUID} to use for the search.
170   *
171   * @return An optional with the {@link Receipt} if it exists, otherwise an empty Optional.
172   */
173  public Optional<Receipt> findReceipt(final UUID identifier) {
174
175    return TransactionManager.receipts().getReceiptByUUID(identifier);
176  }
177
178  /**
179   * This is used to return a range of {@link Receipt receipts}, based on a time range.
180   *
181   * @param start The start of the time to use for the range.
182   * @param end   The end of the time to use for the range.
183   *
184   * @return A {@link TreeMap} of the receipts that occurred during the time range.
185   */
186  public TreeMap<Long, Receipt> range(final long start, final long end) {
187
188    return TransactionManager.receipts().getReceiptsBetweenTimesAndParticipant(start, end, owner);
189  }
190
191  public Queue<UUID> getReceipts() {
192
193    return receipts;
194  }
195}
